sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
    .block.video(data-video="https://youtube.com/embed/6ASD8gHrDeE")
        img(src="@/assets/uploads/video-poster.png").block__poster
        button(@click="playVideo").block__btn Play
</template>

<script>
    export default {
        name: 'BlockVideo',
        data: function(){
            return {}
        },
        methods: {
            playVideo(){
                let blockVideo = document.getElementsByClassName('video')[0],
                    src = blockVideo.getAttribute('data-video');

                blockVideo.innerHTML = `
                    <iframe src="${src}?autoplay=1" width="100%" height="425px" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
                `;
            }
        }
    }
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
    .block {
        max-width: 676px;
        width: 100%;
        margin-bottom: 50px;
        position: relative;
        padding-bottom: 35.5%;

        &__poster {
            position: absolute;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
        }

        &__btn {
            position: absolute;
            z-index: 2;
            left: 50%;
            top: 50%;
            transform: translate(-50%,-50%);
            width: 65px;
            height: 65px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            opacity: 0.6;
            border: 1px solid #FFFFFF;
            box-sizing: border-box;
            font-family: 'SFProDisplay-Regular';
            font-size: 10px;
            line-height: 19px;
            text-align: center;
            letter-spacing: 1px;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            color: #FFFFFF;
            transition: .5s all ease;

            &:after {
                content: '';
                position: absolute;
                z-index: 1;
                left: 50%;
                top: 50%;
                transform: translate(-50%,-50%);
                width: 100%;
                height: 100%;
                border-radius: 50%;
                opacity: 0.15;
                border: 5px solid #FFFFFF;
                transition: .5s all ease;
                animation-name: play;
                animation-duration: 1s;
                animation-iteration-count: infinite;
                animation-direction: alternate-reverse;
                animation-timing-function: ease;
            }
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 1200px) {
        .block {
            max-width: 600px;
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 960px) {
        .block {
            max-width: 100%;
            padding-bottom: 59%;
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 640px) {
        .block {
            margin-bottom: 31px;
            padding-bottom: 67%;
        }
    }

    @keyframes play {
        0% {
            border: 5px solid #FFFFFF;
        }

        50% {
            border: 10px solid #fff;
        }

        100% {
            border: 5px solid #FFFFFF;
        }
    }
</style>
